TopicTitle: Game crash while using BD armory

Articles.Content:
My game crashed while using BD armory to build anti air systems and then the game crashed twice

https://www.dropbox.com/s/ov0m9ogf3tsx5cy/2015-12-05_182600.zip?dl=0

https://www.dropbox.com/s/89l0tvu6riqthdd/2015-12-05_175034.zip?dl=0

Post it in the thread where the mod author is more likely to see your post and help you.

Edited December 6, 2015 by mythbusters844
So much for bbcode still working

Can't see any (serious) exceptions in your log except for this one:

'FinePrint.Contracts.Parameters.SpecificOrbitParameter.targetBody' not found. -  This is the one that seems to be bringing your game down.

A quick Google Fu tells me that this is to do with having an outdated version of Asteroid Day installed - so you may want to sort that, see if it fixes your issue.

Edited December 6, 2015 by severedsolo
How many mods do you have installed? If you have too many, that could be the problem!
